2fa-enabled.part1: Two-factor authentication has been enabled on your account. You will now be asked to input your authenticator code on login both on the website an in-game.
2fa-enabled.part2: Make note of the following recovery codes, they can be used to acess your account if you lose access to your authenticator. Note that each code can only be used once.
2fa-enabled.part3: Warning: these codes are not going to be shown to you again! Write them down before you leave this screen.

2fa-not-enabled: Two-factor auth is not currently enabled on this account
character-hidden: Hide this character from my account
death-log-double: Killed at level {level} by {killer} (killing blow){killerJust} and {mostdamage}{mostdamageJust}  (most damage).
delete-confirmation-description: Are you sure you want to delete "{name}"?

disable-2fa.description: If you'd like to disable two-factor auth on your account, confirm your password and token below (you can also use a backup token).
disable-2fa.success: Two-factor authentication has been successfully disabled.

enable-2fa-description: Use your authenticator app to scan the QR code below.
generic-error: Something went wrong, please try again.
name: Name

confirmation.canceled: It seems you have canceled your payment. If you have any questions, please reach us at {PUBLIC_SUPPORT_EMAIL}. If you want to try again, please go back to the previous step, your payment method has not been charged.
confirmation.completed:
Your order of {amount} {PUBLIC_TITLE} coins has been confirmed.
Your account has been credited with the coins.
confirmation.nonFinalStatus: Processing your order is taking longer than expected, please reach us at {PUBLIC_SUPPORT_EMAIL} for assistance. for assistance.

failed.done: There was a problem with your order.
failed.processing: There may have been a problem with your order...

pending.done: Confirming your order is taking longer than expected.

validations.email: :field must be a valid email address
validations.max-length: :field must be no more than {max} characters
validations.name: :field must only contain letters, spaces, apostrophes, and hyphens
validations.name-monster: :field must not be the name of a creature.
validations.slug: :field must only contain lowercase letters, numbers, and hyphens

verify.welcome: Welcome! Please verify your account by clicking the button below.

guilds.title: Guilds
guilds.cant-find: Can't find the guild you're looking for?
guilds.taken: A guild with this name already exists.
guilds.invalid-leader: This character does not exist or is not eligible to be a guild leader.
guilds.not-found: A guild with the name "{name}" does not exist.
guilds.balance: Guild bank account balance: {balance} gold.
guilds.leader-label: {name} is their guild leader.
guilds.join-description: Accept or reject your invitation for each of your characters who's invited:
guilds.delete-rank-tooltip: Delete (players will be moved to the next rank below)
guilds.disband-confirmation: Are you sure you want to disband your guild {name}? This will remove every member from the guild.

characters-not-found: A player with the name "{name}" does not exist.
guilds-already-member: "{name}" is already a member of a guild
guilds-ranks-delete-last: Cannot remove the last remaining rank
guilds-ranks-delete-promotion: No ranks of the same level or lower available to move players to
